title: Son, Listen: Real-world Advice Every Boy Needs to Hear
description: The world can be a complicated and crazy place, especially for boys on the journey to becoming men. There are so many pitfalls to avoid, opportunities to seize and decisions to be made. How is a young man to navigate this rocky terrain? In this witty pocket resource discover practical yet invaluable advice that aims to guide, teach and inspire boys of all ages.
author: Damon   Willis
